title: $:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-surfing-keys
name: Surfing on TiddlyWiki
author: oeyoews
text:
{"tiddlers":{"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-surfing-keys/readme":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-surfing-keys/readme","text":"
<$list filter="[[$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-fancybox]!is[missing]]"> <> <$list filter="[[$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-fancybox]is[missing]]">
!! Usage * 当前使用 Ctrl-/ 弹出提示框， 此快捷键与Unility的显示field的快捷间冲突 {{$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-surfing-keys/test}} {{$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-surfing-keys/list}} {{$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-surfing-keys/plugins}} !! NOTE(plugin developer) * because of newline, this shortcut not work, need use vscode to remove this(for dev plugin) * This plugin is part of neotw(not general maybe) !! TODO * use ctrl k use moadal search, how to close modal on click links * 支持动态修改快捷键 "},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-surfing-keys/msg":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-surfing-keys/msg","mask-closable":"yes","subtitle":"{{$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-surfing-keys/icon}} Neotw-surfing-keys","class":"o-surfing-warning tc-modal-centered test-c","text":"

Please install [[Shiraz Callout|https://kookma.github.io/TW-Shiraz/shiraz-callout.html]] plugin

"},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-surfing-keys/style/check":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-surfing-keys/style/check","tags":"$:/tags/Stylesheet","text":".o-surfing-warning .tc-modal, .o-surfing-warning .tc-modal-header, .o-surfing-warning .tc-modal-body, .o-surfing-warning .tc-modal-footer { border-radius: 5px; border: none; background-color: #F5F5F5; } .o-surfing-warning .tc-modal-footer { display:none; } .o-surfing-warning-msg { color: red; font-weight: bold; } "},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-surfing-keys/close-modal":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-surfing-keys/close-modal","text":" <$button class="tc-btn-invisible" tooltip="close">   <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-close-tiddler" $param=<>/> "},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-surfing-keys/explore":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-surfing-keys/explore","text":"<$macrocall $name="tree" prefix={{{ [addsuffix[/]] }}}> "},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-surfing-keys/icon":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-surfing-keys/icon","type":"image/png","text":" "},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-surfing-keys/keyboard-list":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-surfing-keys/keyboard-list","subtitle":"[img width=22 [$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-surfing-keys/icon]] Keyboard shortcuts {{$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-surfing-keys/close-modal}}","mask-closable":"yes","class":"o-surfing-keys tc-modal-centered","text":" <$list filter="[[$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz-callout]!is[missing]]"> <> <> <> <$list filter="[[$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz-callout]is[missing]]"> {{$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-surfing-keys/list}}
View more shortcuts {{$:/core/ui/ControlPanel/KeyboardShortcuts}}
"},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-surfing-keys/list":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-surfing-keys/list","text":"
|Icon|Shortcuts|Description|h |{{$:/core/images/home-button}}|Ctrl+H|Home| |{{$:/core/images/options-button}}|Ctrl+I|Setting| |{{$:/core/images/plugin-generic-plugin}}|Ctrl+Shift+U|Update| |{{$:/core/images/full-screen-button}}|Alt+F|Fullscreen| |{{$:/core/images/help}}|Ctrl+/|Keyboard shortcuts| |{{$:/xp/images/plugin}}|Ctrl+G|Install plugins| |{{$:/core/images/advanced-search-button}}|Ctrl+K|Search| | 👀 |Ctrl+Shift+H|View Fields|
"},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-surfing-keys/plugins":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-surfing-keys/plugins","text":"<$list filter="[[$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz-callout]!is[missing]]"> <$list filter="[all[tiddlers+shadows]surfing[yes]count[]!match[0]]"> <$list filter="[all[tiddlers+shadows]surfing[yes]]" variable="surfing"> <$transclude tiddler={{{ [] }}} mode="block"/> "},"$:/config/ShortcutInfo/close-all":{"title":"$:/config/ShortcutInfo/close-all","text":"Close all tiddlers "},"$:/config/ShortcutInfo/control":{"title":"$:/config/ShortcutInfo/control","text":"Jump "},"$:/config/shortcuts/close-all":{"title":"$:/config/shortcuts/close-all","text":"ctrl-alt-c"},"$:/config/shortcuts/control":{"title":"$:/config/shortcuts/control","text":"ctrl-I"},"$:/config/shortcuts/fullscreen":{"title":"$:/config/shortcuts/fullscreen","text":"alt-F"},"$:/config/shortcuts/get-plugins":{"title":"$:/config/shortcuts/get-plugins","text":"ctrl-g"},"$:/config/shortcuts/surfing-help":{"title":"$:/config/shortcuts/surfing-help","text":"Ctrl-Slash"},"$:/config/shortcuts/home-page":{"title":"$:/config/shortcuts/home-page","text":"ctrl-h"},"$:/config/shortcuts/install-plugins":{"title":"$:/config/shortcuts/install-plugins","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"ctrl-shift-u"},"$:/config/shortcuts/search-filter":{"title":"$:/config/shortcuts/search-filter","text":"ctrl-k"},"$:/config/shortcuts/view-fields":{"title":"$:/config/shortcuts/view-fields","text":"ctrl-shift-h"},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-surfing-keys/style/base":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-surfing-keys/style/base","tags":"$:/tags/Stylesheet","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":".neotw-surfing-keys { position: fixed; right: 1em; bottom: 5px; z-index: 2; } .o-surfing-keys .tc-modal, .o-surfing-keys .tc-modal-header, .o-surfing-keys .tc-modal-body, .o-surfing-keys .tc-modal-footer { border-radius: 10px; border: none; background-color: #F5F5F5; } .o-surfing-keys .tc-modal-footer { display:none; } .o-surfing-keys .tc-modal-header { text-transform: capitalize; } "},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-surfing-keys/test":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-surfing-keys/test","text":"
<$button> [img width=22 [$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-surfing-keys/icon]] <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-modal" $param="$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-surfing-keys/keyboard-list"/>
"},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-surfing-keys/tips":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-surfing-keys/tips","mask-closable":"yes","subtitle":"{{$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-random-tid/did-you-know}}","tags":"Tiddlywiki5Tip","author":"oeyoews","class":"o-random-tip tc-modal-centered","text":"> 按住Ctrl-Shift-G可以显示当前文章的评论 > <> "},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/viewtemplates/view-fields":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/viewtemplates/view-fields","description":"Toggle field handling in view mode","list-before":"$:/core/ui/ViewTemplate/body","tags":"$:/tags/ViewTemplate","text":"<$reveal type=match stateTiddler stateTitle="$:/state/utility/view-fields"stateField=text default=hide text=show tag=div class=kk-ut-viewfields> <$importvariables filter="$:/core/ui/EditTemplate"> <$vars newFieldNameTiddler=<>newFieldValueTiddlerPrefix=<>newFieldNameInputTiddler=<>newFieldNameSelectionTiddler=<>searchListState=<>storeTitle=<>> {{||$:/core/ui/EditTemplate/fields}} "}}}
